txt.en: <rgb=#FF0000>You are too far from Reginard!</rgb>
Poor Reginard has been down on his luck, but he's determined to cook a meal for you.
While Reginard finds more kindling, you should collect mushrooms in the surrounding marsh.
The food seems to be done cooking.\n\nYou should talk to Reginard.
Reginard begins to tell tales of his previous adventures...
Talk to Reginard
'Well, no use letting that dampen my spirits! I'll just try again.\n\n'In the meantime, would you mind harvesting some mushrooms in the marsh? I assure you, the ones that grow here are quite safe.'
You should wait for Reginard to finish cooking.
Time flies by thanks to Reginard's vivid storytelling
DNT
Friends and Good Fortune
DNT
Wait for Reginard to finish cooking
DNT
'Perfect! If you'd like, you can sit with me. It'd be nice to have the company as I cook!\n\n'This reminds me of the time when boars ate all of my food! I'd gotten lost somewhere north of Bree....'
Talk to Reginard
<rgb=#00ff00>Sit</rgb> with Reginard
Collected mushrooms ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
You have collected enough mushrooms for Reginard.\n\nYou should return to him.
DNT
Collect mushrooms ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
You should sit by Reginard as he cooks.

'...and that's how a few of the Big Folk helped me out of a deep hole in the middle of nowhere. You should have seen the look on their faces!

'Ah, there we go! I must say, these mushrooms are some of the best I've cooked yet. I hope you like them!

'By the way... thank you for joining me. I used to venture out here with a close friend of mine -- the one who gave me that lucky clover. He's... no longer around to share in this tradition, but I'm glad you could. Maybe I'm not so unlucky after all!'
